short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of a tropical sunset every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of a tropical sunset every time you open a new tab. The Tropical Sunset Bliss extension brings a calming beach atmosphere to your browser, complemented by a sleek, minimalistic search bar, and customizable shortcuts. Stay connected with real-time weather updates, seamlessly integrated into the stunning backdrop. This extension is perfect for those who seek a moment of tranquility amidst their busy online activities.
